channel.title: How i let bluurrs client only connect to my server
channel.description:
hi i got a question
i got bluurrs client but how i only let it connect to my server so i dont need to change ip then log in plz help me

item.title: How i let bluurrs client only connect to my server
item.dc:creator: @johno2 johno2
item.description:
@johno2 wrote:

might be in Jframe, just look through your client.java and find

127.0.0.1

Then change to your ip for server.

Read full topic
item.source: How i let bluurrs client only connect to my server

item.title: How i let bluurrs client only connect to my server
item.dc:creator: @noobofiyer noobofiyer
item.description:
@noobofiyer wrote:

[quote=“lemons burn, post:2, topic:286854”]go to ur source folder then go in to like a folder called .gui
and there will be like 3 ips thatr the same change all 3 to urs[/quote]

theres not a folder called .gui in source folder but in client folder it does
